articles.title: Warning: Popular Sugar-Free Sweetener Linked to Heart Attacks and Strokes - SciTechDaily
articles.description: High xylitol levels may increase cardiovascular risks by promoting clotting, according to Cleveland Clinic research. Xylitol is a common zero-calorie sweetener found in sugar-free candy and toothpaste. Cleveland Clinic researchers discovered that higher amoun…
articles.content: A recent study by Cleveland Clinic has linked high xylitol levels to increased cardiovascular risk, including heart attacks and strokes. The study suggests that xylitol enhances clotting abilities, l… [+4492 chars]

articles.title: Webb Telescope Uncovers a Mysterious Carbon Treasure Trove Around Young Star - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Using the James Webb Space Telescope, scientists have discovered a rich variety of carbon molecules in a protoplanetary disk around a low-mass star, suggesting a unique type of planet-forming environment that could lead to the creation of carbon-poor planets.…
